content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. It's a fantastic space in a prime location. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking of 300 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand that you're a student and may have budget constraints. However, the price you've mentioned is lower than what I'm expecting for this apartment. It's a brand new, unfurnished apartment in the city center, which usually commands a higher rent. Can you possibly increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I am willing to increase my offer to 350 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for considering my request. While 350 Euros is more in line with the value of the apartment, I'm still looking for a rent that reflects its prime location and modern amenities. Can we discuss a price closer to 400 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. Considering the market and my budget, I am willing to meet you halfway. I can offer 375 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hmm, halfway is an interesting concept. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. However, I must insist that the apartment is worth more than what you're offering. How about we settle on 390 Euros per month? This is a fair price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds reasonable. I agree to the price of 390 Euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment is truly exceptional, and I'm sure you'll enjoy living there. We'll proceed with the paperwork and get everything sorted out for you to move in. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt! I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Haoyu! I'm sure you'll be very happy in your new home. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything, please let me know. Enjoy your stay!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. If there are no further discussions, I will take this opportunity to terminate our conversation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: No, there are no further discussions. I agree to terminate our conversation. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to having you as a tenant. Goodbye!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Goodbye!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Goodbye! If you have any questions or need assistance with anything, please do not hesitate to contact me. I wish you a pleasant stay in your new apartment!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. That is all the questions I have for today. Goodbye!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Haoyu. I'm here to assist you. If you have any further questions or need help with anything, please feel free to contact me. Goodbye!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Goodbye!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Goodbye! I hope you have a wonderful day. If you need anything, just give me a call. Enjoy your new apartment!
